-- | Classes for renderable objects.

@package graphicsFormats
@version 0.1

module Graphics.Formats
class Renderable a
render :: Renderable a => a -> IO ()
displayListR :: Renderable a => a -> IO DisplayList
instance Renderable DisplayList
